genetal.title: Reconstructive and Plastic Surgery of the External Genitalia in Children
genetal.description: Application of modern and reliable plastic surgery techniques

data.title: Hypospadias
data.description: Use of modern and reliable techniques for urethral and penile reconstruction of any complexity, including cases after unsuccessful previous surgeries.

data.title: Bladder Exstrophy
data.description: A multidisciplinary approach to treatment, including complete correction of the defect and management of pubic symphysis abnormalities.

data.title: Concealed Penis
data.description: Application of modern and reliable methods for correction of concealed penis.

data.title: Aphallia
data.description: Phalloplasty (creation of an artificial penis using the patientâ€™s own tissues).

data.title: Iatrogenic Penile Injuries
data.description: Correction of all types of penile injuries.

urology.title: Minimally Invasive Surgery of the Upper and Lower Urinary Tract

data.title: Ureteropelvic Junction Obstruction. Hydronephrosis
data.description: Laparoscopic pyeloplasty (restoration of urine outflow from the kidney).

data.title: Vesicoureteral Reflux (VUR)
data.description: Laparoscopic, open (mini-incision) reimplantation and endoscopic correction.

data.title: Urolithiasis
data.description: Stone removal without incision using laser technology.

data.title: Duplicated Kidney
data.description: Laparoscopic and open (mini-incision) reimplantation or uretero-ureteral anastomosis.

plastic.title: Disorders of Sex Development in Children

data.title: Congenital Adrenal Hyperplasia (CAH) (urogenital sinus and clitoral hypertrophy)
data.description: Feminizing genitoplasty (reconstruction of external genitalia according to the female type) and separation of the urogenital sinus.

data.title: Gonadal Dysgenesis
data.description: Diagnosis is carried out by a multidisciplinary team (pediatric endocrinologist, urologist, geneticist, psychologist) followed by selection of appropriate surgical correction.

data.title: Mixed Gonadal Dysgenesis
data.description: Diagnosis is performed by a multidisciplinary team (pediatric endocrinologist, urologist, geneticist, psychologist) with subsequent selection of appropriate surgical treatment.

data.title: True Hermaphroditism (presence of both ovarian and testicular tissue)
data.description: Diagnosis is carried out by a multidisciplinary team (pediatric endocrinologist, urologist, geneticist, psychologist) followed by appropriate surgical correction.

data.title: Androgen Insensitivity Syndrome
data.description: Diagnosis is carried out by a multidisciplinary team (pediatric endocrinologist, urologist, geneticist, psychologist) with selection of appropriate surgical management.
